issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement castBigInt, castInt, castIntervalDay and castIntervalYear extra functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12479](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12479). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Implement castBIGINT and castINT for floats, doubles, intervalDay and intervalYear.
   \* Implement Castnullablebigint/int for interval year.
   \* Implement Castnullableintervalday/year receiving int and bigint

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12479?focusedCommentId=17393002) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10112
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10112>
